languages.text: В конструкцию этого изысканного орудия были встроены эльдарские механизмы войны. Лишь Вольный Торговец может позволить себе владение оружием, попирающим законы Механикус столь вопиющим образом.
The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: В конструкцию этого изысканного орудия были встроены эльдарские механизмы войны. Лишь Вольный Торговец может позволить себе владение оружием, попирающим законы Механикус столь вопиющим образом.

traits.locale_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavation on Janus. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavation on Janus. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavation on Janus. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavation on Janus. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: El diseño de esta arma tan exquisita emplea mecanismos bélicos de origen Aeldari. Solo un Comerciante Independiente podría permitirse un arma que ignora los preceptos del Adeptus Mechanicus de forma tan flagrante.
languages.original_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: El diseño de esta arma tan exquisita emplea mecanismos bélicos de origen Aeldari descubiertos al excavar Janus. Solo un Comerciante Independiente podría permitirse un arma que ignora los preceptos del Adeptus Mechanicus de forma tan flagrante.

languages.text: La conception de cette arme raffinée fait appel à des mécanismes de guerre aeldaris. Seul un libre-marchand peut se permettre d'employer une arme méprisant à ce point les lois de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.
languages.original_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: La conception de cette arme raffinée fait appel à des mécanismes de guerre aeldaris mis au jour lors de fouilles sur Janus. Seul un libre-marchand peut se permettre d'employer une arme méprisant à ce point les lois de l'Adeptus Mechanicus.

languages.text: 这种精妙的武器参考了艾达灵族的战争装置。它的设计严重违反了机械修会法令，只有行商浪人才能毫无顾忌地使用这样的武器。
languages.original_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: 这种精妙的武器参考了艾达灵族的战争装置。它的设计严重违反了机械修会法令，只有行商浪人才能毫无顾忌地使用这样的武器。

languages.text: この精巧な武器の設計には、アエルダリの戦争機構が用いられている。帝国技術局の法を無視した武器を所有できるのは、ローグトレーダーだけである。
languages.original_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: この精巧な武器の設計には、ヤヌスの発掘調査で発見されたアエルダリの戦争機構が用いられている。帝国技術局の法を無視した武器を所有できるのは、ローグトレーダーだけである。

languages.text: Diese exquisite Waffe nutzt Aeldari-Kriegsmechanismen. Nur Freihändler können es sich leisten, eine Waffe zu besitzen, die derart unverfroren die Gesetze des Adeptus Mechanicus ignoriert.
languages.original_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

traits.locale_text: Diese exquisite Waffe nutzt Aeldari-Kriegsmechanismen, die bei Ausgrabungsarbeiten auf Janus entdeckt wurden. Nur ein Freihändler kann es sich leisten, eine Waffe zu besitzen, die derart unverfroren die Gesetze des Adeptus Mechanicus ignoriert.

languages.text: Bu üstün silahın tasarımında Aeldari savaş mekanizmalarından yararlanılmıştır. Adeptus Mechanicus'un kanunlarını böylesine hiçe sayan bir silaha sahip olmayı ancak bir Hür Tacir göze alabilir.
languages.original_text: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
